tool_description: Initiates background checks for volunteer candidates through approved screening services, manages consent forms, and tracks screening status.

candidate_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer candidate

check_type.description: Type of background check: basic, standard, comprehensive

position_type.description: Type of volunteer position for appropriate screening level

consent_received.description: Whether written consent has been obtained

error_messages: Missing consent: Consent must be received before initiating background check.
Invalid personal information: All personal information fields must be complete and valid.
Invalid check type: Check type must be basic, standard, or comprehensive.
Invalid date format: Date of birth must be in ISO 8601 format.
Security validation failed: Personal information validation failed.
Service unavailable: Background check service is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide complete candidate information including personal details, position type, and ensure consent is received. Select appropriate check type and processing speed. The tool initiates the screening process.

screening_id.description: Unique identifier for the background check

status.description: Current status of the background check
